title: Quali sono le vostre quotes preferite?
body:
Ciao ragazzi! Oggi vi volevo chiedere quali sono le vostre quotes preferite? La mie per esempio sono ""Put it on my tab. The name's Pantheon, with a P." di Aurelion Sol e "Yes, that was a banana. *giggles* No one expects the banana." di Soraka. A presto!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
"Stars are wonder and love ignited." {{champion:136}} 
"You need not follow, but you must witness" {{champion:268}}

Questi soo i miei preferiti, mi scuso ora se e' in inglese mha io gioco LoL in inglese.

{{champion:202}} 
"In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."
"Which is the lie? The mask, or my face?"
"I am the singer without a voice. The dancer without legs."
"Behind every mask... is another mask."
"Everyone wears a mask. I just chose to create my own."
"I cannot be good. I must be perfection."
"Break a leg! Hehe, oh. 'Break a leg', hehe... ah, delightful. I do cut myself up."

{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} 
 Rakan: "Did I tell you I love you?"
Xayah: "Yes... but say it anyway."
Rakan: "I love you."
-------
Rakan: "Why do you never say yes?"
Xayah: "'cause then... I wouldn't get to hear you ask."

{{champion:203}} 
 Lamb: "Never one... "
Wolf: "...without the other."
-------
Lamb: "Every life... "
Wolf: "...ends with us."
-------
Lamb: "Life is ours... "
Wolf: "...to end!"
-------
Lamb: "Time to... "
Wolf: "...end this."
--------
 Wolf: "Mine?"
Lamb: "Ours."
--------
 Lamb: "Flee - or stand firm."
Wolf: "Doesn't matter!"
---------
Wolf: "None can hide!"
Lamb: "Though many try."
---------
Wolf: "They race from us!"
Lamb: "Only to find us sooner."
---------
Wolf: "They know we'll come."
Lamb: "Yet they are never prepared."
---------
Wolf: "None can hide!"
Lamb: "Though many try."
---------
Lamb: "They laugh."
Wolf: "And scream!"
Lamb: "And dance."
Wolf: "And flee!"
--------
Wolf: "I see water!"
Lamb: "They are called... tears."
---------
Wolf: "I'll give you a running start!"
Lamb: "Not that it will help."
---------
 Lamb: "Choose now - my arrows... "
Wolf: "...or my teeth?!"

{{champion:164}} 
"Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."
"Don't engage if you don't seek to win."
"Do nothing if you wish to be nothing."
"I don't play the game, I make the rules."
"Elegance never goes out of fashion."

{{champion:245}} 
"It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."
"Every second matters."
"Time doesn't heal all wounds."
"Never look back."
"Mi dispiace Urgot, sono cose da guardiane stellari" {{champion:222}} (SG)
Sorridi e i tuoi occhi brilleranno Lux
"Vivere nella paura, è come essere morti." {{champion:113}}

"Puoi cambiare solo se sei disposto a camminare, contando 100 passi lungo la tua strada"{{champion:420}} 
Per quanto odio Illaoi, questa frase mi commuove tanto
